response.overview: The film tells the story of a poor woman who gave her twin daughters, under different circumstances, to two separate families. Both families promised the mother that they would provide her with the addresses of the two families with whom her twin daughters would live so that she would remain in contact with her daughters, but the addresses they gave were wrong. A struggling and activist woman who works in front of hotels and car garages, which led her to meet the families who gave her twin daughters to them as tourists. God did not bless these two families with successors, and the end of the story remains the beginning of the film, as the two daughters will meet 25 years later and after their marriage in a hotel in Marrakesh.
response.title: بنات رحمة
